text: whenever I would fly home especially if
it was at night there was the city of

and I thought myself this belongs to me
it's extraordinary directed by Neil
Barsky Koch is a documentary on the

the spirit of New York Edward Koch is

hour-and-a-half mr. Barsky provides
might be enough time for a lesser figure
mr. Koch needs more a miniseries the
Dreiser novel a sprawling epic combining
the talents of sidney lumet Woody Allen

people threw me out and now the people
must be punished Koch's charming
infuriating and sometimes coyly he can
be exhausting even in small doses but he
has never been born you have to get
attention of the public you got to get

national figure what he says matters on
everything left I was found an elevator
